text: Al Jean (born January 9, 1961 in Farmington Hills, Michigan) is an American television comedy writer best known for his work on The Simpsons. He has been showrunning (managing) The Simpsons since season 13. ==Other websites== * * Washington Post - A Q&A; with Al Jean Category:Screenwriters from Michigan Category:The Simpsons Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:People from Farmington Hills, Michigan
title: Al Jean
